game.title: Quest: The Power of Three
game.description: You have received a letter from your grandfather...

task.objective: Find the first artifact: The Eye of Horus
task.description: Located in Egypt, near a small town that suddenly appeared on the Nile River.

task.objective: Find the second artifact: The Armor of Achilles
task.description: In Greece, where it's said to protect against ancient Greek weapons.

task.objective: Find the third artifact: The Winged Helmet of Hermes
task.description: Achilles' helmet from the Trojan War, discovered in the land of Greece.
